segments.text: I am a little nervous about my presentation on Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you would like me to , I could help you with that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wouldn't that take you away from your project ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have plenty of time to do this . I promise you it won't be a problem for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a good time for you to help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If we work on this tomorrow night , you could easily be ready by Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about meeting in my office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would work out well . Bring any concerns that you might have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds like you'll be able to help me a lot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . Everything will go well . I promise !
segments.speaker: S2
